name: Kombai
description: Kombai is an AI-powered tool that converts Figma designs into high-quality, production-ready front-end code to streamline web development.
longDescription: Kombai is an innovative AI platform that automates the conversion of Figma prototypes into clean, semantic code, primarily focusing on React for web applications. Its mission is to eliminate the tedious manual coding process from designs, enabling faster collaboration between designers and developers while reducing errors in handoffs. By using advanced machine learning, Kombai interprets design layers, layouts, and interactions to generate logical code structures that match the original intent. This solves key problems in web development workflows, such as time-consuming translations from design tools to code, making it ideal for teams building responsive websites. Users can integrate it directly with Figma, select elements, and receive instant code outputs that are customizable and ready for refinement.
features: Automatically generates React code from Figma designs, saving developers hours of manual work and ensuring design fidelity.
Supports complex components like loops, conditionals, and nested structures, allowing for sophisticated web app builds directly from prototypes.
Provides one-click code generation for selected design layers, making it easy to extract specific elements without full project conversion.
Uses AI to infer logical code patterns, such as grouping similar elements into reusable components for better maintainability.
Integrates seamlessly as a Figma plugin, enabling real-time code previews within the design environment.
Offers high-fidelity CSS and HTML output that matches pixel-perfect designs, including responsive layouts and styling.
Allows users to customize generated code with options for variable naming and framework adjustments to fit project needs.
Handles dynamic elements like forms and interactions, producing functional code snippets ready for integration.
Provides error-free code suggestions based on design best practices, reducing debugging time in development.
Supports export to various formats, facilitating easy incorporation into existing codebases or IDEs.

faqs.question: What is Kombai used for?
faqs.answer: Kombai is used to convert Figma design prototypes into production-ready front-end code, primarily React, to speed up the web development process. It helps bridge the gap between design and coding teams by automating repetitive tasks.

faqs.question: Does Kombai support frameworks other than React?
faqs.answer: Currently, Kombai focuses on generating React code, but it provides clean HTML and CSS that can be adapted to other frameworks. Future updates may expand to additional frameworks based on user demand.

faqs.question: Is Kombai free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kombai offers free access with limited credits for code generations, allowing users to test its core features before subscribing to a paid plan for unlimited usage.

faqs.question: How accurate is the code generated by Kombai?
faqs.answer: Kombai's AI produces highly accurate, semantic code that closely matches the Figma design, including layouts and styles. Users may need minor tweaks for custom logic, but it significantly reduces manual coding errors.

faqs.question: Can Kombai handle complex designs with interactions?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kombai can interpret and generate code for complex designs, including conditional logic, loops, and interactive elements like forms. It uses AI to understand design intent and structure code accordingly.

faqs.question: How do I integrate Kombai with Figma?
faqs.answer: Kombai integrates as a plugin in Figma; simply install it from the Figma community, select design layers, and generate code directly within the tool.

faqs.question: What kind of support does Kombai offer?
faqs.answer: Kombai provides documentation, tutorials, and email support for users. Paid plans include priority support and access to community forums for troubleshooting.

faqs.question: Is Kombai suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kombai is beginner-friendly as it automates code generation from designs, but some basic knowledge of web development is helpful for customizing outputs.
